tool_description: Popular and unique baby name name generator for boys, girls, and gender-neutral names. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/babynames
name: Baby Names by API-Ninjas
title: Baby Names by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/babynames
api_list.description: API Ninjas Baby Names API endpoint. Returns 10 baby name results.

optional_parameters.name: popular_only
optional_parameters.description: Whether to only return popular (top 10%) of names. Must be either true or false. If unset, default is true.

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Baby name gender. Must be one of the following: boy, girl, neutral
